inputs.responseText: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback and are glad you found our product helpful.
inputs.longResponse: Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback. We truly appreciate your insights and are committed to continuously improving our products and services. Your experience matters to us, and we're glad we could meet your expectations. If you have any further questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.
